answers.answer: get tested to end your fears symptoms mean nothing at all
been tested 8wks 12 wks and 17 wks all negative rapid quick swab and blood stick just wondering could something slip thru the crack Please answer my question

If you've been tested and it was negative, you should really investigate your symptoms further with your doctor to find another cause. Numbess, tingling, blurred vision...could be a neurological disorder. Lupus, Lyme's disease, MS, B12 deficiency...work with your doctor to rule some stuff out.

what is really puzzling me is my wife have the same symptoms that i have everytime I have a symptoms a couple days later she comesdown with the same  I  just had sore throat 2  every so often recent sore throat come and go  2 days  later she has a sore throat she has numbness, tinglingand burning sensation of the feet hands and othe pats of the body also she know nothing about my encounter 5weeks ago. Could thes rapis test be pretty accfurate is they just as accurate as blood drawn from vein I guess that is the traditional Elisa test. Pleas reply to my concerns
yes they are accurateLook SYMPTOMS dont mean anything at ALL

Hi I am selva,I am also having the same symptoms as u have, i also have PN fro last 2 months and even sore throat. my 95 days DUO test, 80days PCR RNA test and 130 days HIV test everything is negative, but still i have the PN symptoms

You guys do NOT have peripheral neuropathy, I would guarantee it.What you most likely are suffering from is symptoms of severe anxiety.  One of the more commonly reported symptoms is numbness/tingling/pins and needles feelings pretty much anywhere in the body....Peripheral Neuropathy is something that happens late in infection, not with new infection.  If it HAS happened to someone early on...it was most likely a result of either another disease process (ie diabetes)....or again, anxiety.Believe in the negative results, scooby...and if you can't, you need to seek some professional help!!

question: Does peripheral neuropathy come on at early stage of HIV infection or later I have been having PN symptoms for 2 months and My las encounter was 4 months ago. Tingling over my body numbness and burning sensations along with blurred vision and head aches.
title: HIV PN
